Posts.EditableText:
Yes, it;s called a "time-out" and should be like that unless you "log-out"... You probably deleted the cookie after the 'session' (firefox can get rid of it if you have only for session and close firefox).
[quote:2helpdfx]Post here again if you have anymore problems.[/quote:2helpdfx]Alex should close this topic just for that reply.
Any problems should be emailed to the 'admin'. Email takes approx 5 mins to reach its destination (actually - it's faster but I'll stick with 5 mins for a save time).
Posts.HTML:
